decisions.what: Relocate daily LLM-driven business reports from public channel to squad-rte-vms-business-metrics channel
decisions.context: To de-clutter the public channel and repurpose it for stakeholder requests and bug reports

decisions.what: Set channel topic to 'A channel that collects daily LLM-driven business reports'

entities.name: VMS Business Metrics Report
entities.context: Automated daily report showing funnel metrics (landing page, products page, signup, checkout, orders) with AI analysis

entities.name: tam-expansion-crons
entities.context: GitHub repository hosting the VMS daily business metrics reports

entities.name: U01V9SX5NG5
entities.context: Team member performing channel housekeeping and relocating reports

entities.name: U08MATAG2TW
entities.context: Bot or user posting automated daily VMS business metrics reports

entities.name: squad-rte-vms-business-metrics
entities.context: Team channel for collecting daily LLM-driven business reports

entities.name: HelloFresh
entities.context: Parent organization running VMS business and Slack workspace

blockers.description: Severe VMS funnel performance decline on Nov 5 with 72-83% drops across all metrics, suggesting technical or marketing system failure
blockers.impact: Critical business impact with orders dropping to 4 (from 23 previous day), requiring immediate investigation

blockers.description: Persistent week-over-week decline in top-of-funnel traffic (landing page views down 11-18% across multiple days)
blockers.impact: Reduced traffic acquisition affecting future order volume despite stable conversion rates

blockers.description: Mid-funnel conversion issues with significant drop-offs between products page and signup (e.g., 2,368 product views to only 67 signups on Nov 9)
blockers.impact: Conversion optimization needed as only ~3% of product viewers reach signup stage

action_items.task: Investigate cause of severe Nov 5 performance collapse (72-83% drops across all funnel metrics)
Address persistent top-of-funnel traffic decline and marketing acquisition challenges
Optimize mid-funnel conversion rates, particularly products-to-signup stage

key_context.summary: VMS funnel metrics show volatile performance from Nov 5-10, 2025, with a severe collapse on Nov 5 (likely technical issue) followed by recovery but persistent week-over-week declines in traffic. Orders ranged from 4-17 daily with conversion rates around 1-1.6%.
key_context.relevance: Critical for understanding business health and identifying systematic issues requiring intervention

key_context.summary: Daily automated reports provide funnel metrics with AI-generated executive summaries and insights, analyzing day-over-day and week-over-week trends. Reports are generated from tam-expansion-crons repository and posted to dedicated squad channel.
key_context.relevance: Demonstrates operational maturity in business monitoring and data-driven decision making

key_context.summary: Despite traffic volatility, conversion rates from landing to orders remained relatively stable (1-1.6%), but absolute traffic volumes declined week-over-week. Major drop-off occurs between products page and signup (typically 70%+ drop).
key_context.relevance: Indicates traffic quality is maintained but acquisition volume needs improvement, and mid-funnel optimization is critical opportunity

summary: Squad relocated automated VMS business metrics reports to dedicated channel, revealing significant performance issues including a severe Nov 5 collapse and persistent traffic decline, though conversion rates remained stable around 1-1.6% with orders ranging 4-17 daily.
